entry.summary: October 6, 2023 4:00 a.m. Pursuant to a Presidential Proclamation, Governor Tina Kotek ordered flags at Oregon public institutions to be returned to full-staff, as of sunset on Thursday. entry.title: Sōl: capturing artistic souls in a single shot
entry.summary: Kevin Eckerman crafted his project “sōl” based on the word soul — meaning the spiritual principle embodied in human beings — and his hopes of capturing it in his year-long, black-and-white portrait project showcasing 25 various artists.
